analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/38/0x2f6df62bdd34c085915d6f0061150bf222011b5a.sol:
	Contract EthTranchePricing has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/38/0x2f6df62bdd34c085915d6f0061150bf222011b5a.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

	- finalizeAgent.finalizeCrowdsale() (/unique_chucks/38/0x2f6df62bdd34c085915d6f0061150bf222011b5a.sol#589-590)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- finalized (/unique_chucks/38/0x2f6df62bdd34c085915d6f0061150bf222011b5a.sol#591)

Crowdsale.getState (/unique_chucks/38/0x2f6df62bdd34c085915d6f0061150bf222011b5a.sol#730-761) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp <= endsAt && ! isCrowdsaleFull() (/unique_chucks/38/0x2f6df62bdd34c085915d6f0061150bf222011b5a.sol#750-761)
	- block.timestamp < startsAt (/unique_chucks/38/0x2f6df62bdd34c085915d6f0061150bf222011b5a.sol#745-761)
